item.title: About Me
item.description: I study Applied Mathematics & Computer Science at South Dakota School of Mines and Technology. What I spend my time on: Mountain Biking Ultimate Frisbee Data Analysis School Experience Co-Founder/CTO - HomeMetricsLLC (June 2019 to Present) Research Assistant - South Dakota School of Mines & Technology Rapid City, SD (August 2019 to Present) Software Engineering Intern - Quarq Spearfish, SD (May 2019 to Present) Teaching Assistant - South Dakota School of Mines & Technology

item.title: Projects
item.description: HomeMetricsLLC An IoT startup focused on solving catestrophic home failure with intelligent sensor networks. MinneMUDAC Fall 2019: Soybeans Participated in the MUDAC Data Analysis competition where my team studied ways to predict soybean index prices. Video of the presentation – LINK WHEN RECORDED Sample Jupyter Notebook – LINK WHEN PERFECTED Placed 3rd in Novice Division Undergraduate Research My research has mainly focused on multi-dimensional time series models.
